summary.para: Retrieves the current option set for a specified field in a logon or credential UI. Called by the credential provider framework.

param.name: fieldID
param.para: The ID of the field in the logon or credential UI.

param.name: options
param.para: A pointer to an value that, when this method returns successfully, receives one or more flags that specify the current options for the field.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides a method that enables the credential provider framework to determine whether you've made a customization to a field's option in a logon or credential UI.

remarks.para: Implement this interface if your credential provider overrides the default field options through . This enables the credential provider framework to determine the field options that you've specified .
